name: Moonies - Create Your Galaxies
description:
Become the biggest space creator in the universe! Merge planets and build your own galaxy empire in this epic idle game. Are you ready to conquer the universe?

FEATURES
- Match & Merge planets to build an amazing fun universe.
- Create your unique galaxy.
- Get idle money, even when you are offline.
- Profit from different features to boost your rewards.
- Spin the wheel to win incredible treasure gifts.
- Double speed feature.
- Earnings x3!
- Find the UFO alien to get special rewards and merge planets faster.
- Easy to play space building simulator.
- Intuitive gameplay with challenging tasks, quests, rewards, and achievements.

Do you have what it takes to become the biggest space tycoon master?
